request.description:
Obtain a list of posts. Soft-deleted models are only retrieved if the user has administrator rights.

Access:
	
	All users.

Parameters:

    limit     Maximum number of results to fetch
    page      Page of results to fetch
    search    Restrict the results to the given search string
    sort[]    Results order array
    with[]    Array of related objects to fetch

Synapse filter:

    synapse_id			Synapse

Relation filters:

    municipality_id		Municipalities
    project_id			Projects
    school_id			Schools
    territory_id		Territories
    tag_id				Tags

Related objects that can be fetched:

    author    Author object
    feed      Feed object
    reaction  Authenticated user reactions
    tags	  Post tags
